mapper.select: SELECT bmc.id as last_category_id, max(bm.code) as code FROM bas_material bm inner join bas_material_category bmc on SUBSTR(bm.code,1,LENGTH(bm.code) - 4) = bmc.`code` group by bmc.`code`
select * from bas_material where code like concat(#{code},'%') order by code desc

SELECT bs.NAME AS supp_name, bs.CODE AS supp_code, bs.supplier_type, bqr.price_tax, br.spe_type, bqr.create_time, bq.currency, sup.is_recommend FROM bidding_quote_record bqr left join bidding_quote bq on bqr.quote_id = bq.id LEFT JOIN bas_supplier bs ON bqr.supp_id = bs.id LEFT JOIN bidding_record br ON bqr.record_id = br.id LEFT JOIN bidding_supplier sup ON bqr.bidding_id = sup.bidding_id AND sup.supplier_id = bqr.supp_id WHERE bqr.del_flag = '0' and br.prod_code = #{query.code} UNION ALL SELECT bs.NAME AS supp_name, bs.CODE AS supp_code, bs.supplier_type, sq.order_price_tax AS price_tax, sq.spe_type, sq.create_time, sq.currency, isp.is_recommend FROM sup_quote sq LEFT JOIN bas_supplier bs ON sq.supp_id = bs.id LEFT JOIN inquiry_supplier isp on sq.record_id = isp.record_id and sq.supp_id = isp.supplier_id left join inquiry_record ir on sq.record_id = ir.id where sq.del_flag = '0' and ir.prod_code = #{query.code}
